column6: 1973 to herbert and judy downing walker. he was a water well driller for walker water well services a 4th generation family business. coy was a member of the baptist church and was an ordained minister. he is preceded in death by his grandmothers
column7: jannie downing and juanez walker; grandfather
column8: nolan walker; uncle mike walker and aunt dories barker. coy is survived by his parents
column9: herb and judy walker of weatherford; brother
column14: kay clepper of springtown and karen malone of weatherford; grandfather
column15: jack downing of weatherford; numerous nieces
